changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE "membership" ( "id" UUID NOT NULL, "ts" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), "role" VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, "account_id" UUID NOT NULL, "organization_id" UUID NOT NULL, -- PRIMARY KEY ("id"), FOREIGN KEY ("account_id") REFERENCES "account" ("id") ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY ("organization_id") REFERENCES "organization" ("id") ON DELETE CASCADE, UNIQUE ("organization_id", "account_id") ); CREATE INDEX "idx_membership_account_id" ON "membership" ("account_id");
